title: unable to update league
body: it says "somethings up with our servers and its preventing you from patching. were giving it another shot" its error 003 and it just stays on 0 percent it makes the special sound when its done updating but then the notification re-appears

If you still run into any issues, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look with you directly.
